examples.name: apply_ops_sentiment

data: This is ridiculous! I will never buy from this company again!

Josephina was awesome! She was very helpful and patient. I wish more customer \
                 service folks are like her!
I can't believe that garbage is still out there. That is so false!

examples.command: qsv apply operations sentiment "customer comment" data.csv
